instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 2011 iMac blink led light
threads.message:
have a 2011 iMac that came in with video and overheating issues. Before  disassembling noticed it would not power on and off consistently with power button without unplugging and plugging back in. After GPU replacement the LED 1 just blinks and when power button is pressed the fans will spin but no chime and light continuously blinks. It also continuously blinks with nothing connected but the power supply.

does this indicate 100% the power supply is defective?

threads.title: 2011 iMac blink led light
threads.message:
Post 820-xxxx code of MLB.
Tell us which voltage is stable, or pulsing all.
